mainBoard.name: Counterspell
mainBoard.originalText: Counters target spell as it is being cast.

foreignData.name: Kreaturenbindung
foreignData.text: Wenn das verzauberte Wesen auf dem Friedhof landet, fügt es durch die Bindung seinem Beherrscher Schaden in Höhe seiner Widerstandskraft zu.

mainBoard.name: Creature Bond
mainBoard.originalText: If target creature is placed in the graveyard, Creature Bond does an amount of damage equal to creature's toughness to creature's controller.
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, this Aura deals damage equal to that creature's toughness to the creature's controller.

mainBoard.name: Giant Tortoise
mainBoard.text: This creature gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island Fish Jasconius
mainBoard.originalText: You must pay {U}{U}{U} during your untap phase to untap Island Fish. Island Fish cannot attack unless opponent has islands in play. Island Fish is destroyed immediately if at any time you have no islands in play.

rulings.text: Reworded so that it triggers only once at beginning of upkeep, instead of being an activated ability usable any time during your upkeep. You can no longer make infinite combos with this ability.

mainBoard.text:
This creature doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, untap this creature.
This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice this creature.

foreignData.name: Sprung
foreignData.text: Die Zielkreatur kann bis zum Ende des Zuges fliegen.

mainBoard.name: Jump
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature is a flying creature until end of turn.

rulings.text: To work as an evasion ability, an attacking creature must already have flying when the declare blockers step begins. Once a creature has become blocked, giving it flying won’t change that.

mainBoard.text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

mainBoard.name: Leviathan
mainBoard.originalText:
Trample
Leviathan comes into play tapped, and does not untap as normal during your untap phase.
Sacrifice two islands during your upkeep phase to untap Leviathan.
Leviathan may not attack unless you sacrifice two islands during your attack.

rulings.text: You don't have to pay the untap cost if it is untapped outside the upkeep phase or is untapped by an effect.

mainBoard.text:
Trample
This creature enters tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap this creature.
This creature can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

foreignData.name: Manaschatz
foreignData.text:
Der Manaschatz enttappt nicht normal während Deiner Enttap-Phase. Wenn er während Deiner Versorgungsphase getappt bleibt, fügt er Dir einen Schadenspunkt zu.
{4}: Enttappe Manaschatz. Du kannst diese Fähigkeit nur während Deiner Versorgungsphase benützen.
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um 3 farblose Mana. Behandle diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungs-zauber.

mainBoard.name: Mana Vault
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add 3 colorless mana to your mana pool. Mana Vault doesn't untap normally during untap phase; to untap it, you must pay 4 mana during your upkeep. If Mana Vault remains tapped during upkeep it does 1 damage to you. Drawing mana from this artifact is played as an interrupt.
mainBoard.text:
This artifact doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap this artifact.
At the beginning of your draw step, if this artifact is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

foreignData.name: Reich der Illusionen
foreignData.text: Verzaubere ein Land in ein Standardland Deiner Wahl.

mainBoard.name: Phantasmal Terrain
mainBoard.originalText: Target land changes to any basic land type of caster's choice. Land type is set when cast and may not be further altered by this card.

rulings.text: Will not add or remove the supertype snow to or from a land.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant land
As this Aura enters, choose a basic land type.
Enchanted land is the chosen type.

mainBoard.flavorText: Legend has it that Serpents used to be bigger, but how could that be?

foreignData.name: Seeschlange
foreignData.text: Die Schlange kann nur angreifen, wenn der Gegner Inseln im Spiel hat. Wenn Du zu irgendeiner Zeit keine Inseln mehr im Spiel hast, geht die Schlange direkt auf den Friedhof.

mainBoard.name: Sea Serpent
mainBoard.originalText: Serpent cannot attack unless opponent has islands in play. Serpent is buried immediately if at any time controller has no islands in play.
mainBoard.text:
This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice this creature.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Leviathan, too! Can you catch him with a fish-hook/ or run a line round his tongue?"
—*Job 40:25*
mainBoard.name: Segovian Leviathan
mainBoard.text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

foreignData.name: Lockruf der Sirenen
foreignData.text: Sämtliche Kreaturen des Gegners, die angreifen könnten, müssen angreifen. Alle Kreaturen, die es nicht tun und keine Mauern sind, werden am Ende der Spielrunde vernichtet. Dieser Spontanzauber kann nur gespielt werden, wenn der Gegner am Ende des Zuges ist, und nur vor seiner Angriffsphase. Kreaturen, die während dieser Runde heraufbeschworen wurden, bleiben vom Lockruf der Sirenen verschont.

mainBoard.name: Siren's Call
mainBoard.originalText: All of opponent's creatures that can attack must do so. Any non-wall creatures that cannot attack are killed at end of turn. Can be played only during opponent's turn, before opponent's attack. Creatures summoned this turn are unaffected by Siren's Call.

rulings.text: It will require creatures with Haste to attack since they are able, but it won’t destroy them if they don’t for some reason.
The creature is destroyed if it does not attack because it simply can’t do so legally.
This will destroy creatures that weren’t able to attack because they had been previously tapped.
If a turn has multiple combat phases, this spell can only be cast before the beginning of the Declare Attackers Step of the first combat phase in that turn.

mainBoard.text:
Cast this spell only during an opponent's turn, before attackers are declared.
Creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able.
At the beginning of the next end step, destroy all non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Ignore this effect for each creature the player didn't control continuously since the beginning of the turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Unpredictable as the sea itself, Water Elementals shift without warning from tranquility to tempest. Capricious and fickle, they flow restlessly from one shape to another, expressing their moods with their physical forms.
mainBoard.name: Water Elemental

foreignData.name: Blauer Urknall
foreignData.text: Neutralisiert einen roten Zauberspruch oder zerstört eine rote Karte im Spiel.

sideBoard.name: Blue Elemental Blast
sideBoard.originalText: Counters a red spell being cast or destroys a red card in play.

rulings.text: The decision to counter a spell or destroy a permanent is a decision made on announcement before the target is selected. If the spell is redirected, this mode can't be changed, so only targets of the selected type are valid.

sideBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target red spell.
• Destroy target red permanent.

foreignData.name: Lebenszeichen
foreignData.text: Für jeden Wald Deines Gegners, der getappt wird, erhältst Du 1 Lebenspunkt.

sideBoard.name: Lifetap
sideBoard.originalText: You gain 1 life each time any forest of opponent's becomes tapped.

rulings.text: Gives one life for each and every Forest tapped.
In multi-player games it affects all opponents.

sideBoard.text: Whenever a Forest an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.
